channel.title: Fight Caves Question

item.title: Fight Caves Question
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

It doesn’t seem to work logically?

public void getMax(int npc) { case = MAX.ArrayIndex[0]; return = MAX.ArrayIndex[1]; } When you call the getMax method, it’s not doing anything with your argument.

Read full topic

item.title: Fight Caves Question
item.dc:creator: @Xellium Xellium
item.description:
@Xellium wrote:

Can I turn this:

public int getMax(int npc) { switch (npc) { case 2627: return 4; case 2630: return 7; case 2631: return 13; case 2741: return 28; case 2743: return 54; case 2745: return 97; } return 5; }

Into something like this?

[CODE] public int[][] MAX = {
/* Cases /
{2627, 2630, 2631, 2741, 2743, 2745},
/ Returns */
{4, 7, 13, 28, 54, 97},
};

public void getMax(int npc) {
	case = MAX.ArrayIndex[0];
	return = MAX.ArrayIndex[1];
}[/CODE]

I’m sure if I can, I’m missing something.

Read full topic
